pages.text: $(item)Mushy Cake$() is made of 1 $(item)Brown Mushroom$(), 1 $(item)Red Mushroom$(), 1 $(item)Crimson Fungus$() and 1 $(item)Warped Fungus$() in the $(pot)Ultimate Crock Pot$(). It takes 30 seconds to cook.

Eating a $(item)Mushy Cake$() will give you $(thing)Wither Resistance$() effect for 1 minute.$(br2)$(thing)Wither Resistance$() effect will remove Wither effect from you and will prevent you from gaining Wither effect.
